name: Brought Me Back
content: Opened up my heart  and I let you in
And I think that I did just right
Lost in the dark of the nights
You gave me sunny days in many ways
You put a sparkle on my life
And I know that I did just right
Girl  you saved my broken heart
You've always been by my side
You got me back my smile
So baby now I'm bloom in love
And I know that I did just right
Girl  you saved my broken heart
Put down the light  lay on the floor
Hold me tight  baby don't let go
Don't let go  don't let go
Girl  you saved my broken heart
